name: Silent Space (itch) (E.T.C.Lundberg, yuko_inx, Cem_Ertekin, WMII)
description:
Aboard the derelict BETA-43 space station, your only hope for survival is to just keep moving forward. Death is all but certain and you have nothing but your wits and your meager tools to survive.

dare to dream a nightmare from which you wouldn’t want to wake up

What unleashed the horrors upon this station? What happened to the crew? Discover the truth as you try to avoid detection and make your way to the escape pods.

Silent Space is a horror metroidvania made for the Themed Horror Game Jam #6 in 1 month by a group of game developers from all around the globe. 

Controls
  • Move - Joystick, WASD or Arrowkeys
  • Jump - A or Space
  • Access map - Press Select or Tab to toggle the map.
  • Stun Repulsor - Press X or Left click to fire. Recharges on cooldown.
  • Cryo Grenade - Press Y or Right click. Freezes unprotected lifeforms. 
  • Jetpack - Press R1 or shift to Dash, and L1 or Q to do a Controlled Float.
